reviews.review: Fun way to ruin a perfectly good evening. 10/10, would let it put me in an awful mood again.

J'aime beaucoup le jeu autant en survivant que tueur. Mais je ne mettrai pas d'évaluation positive tant que les dévs n'auront pas réparé les mises à jour du jeu. Quasiment à chaque fois qu'il y a une mise à jour de DBD l'étape "réorganisation"/"installation" prend minimum 1 heure (et parfois reste bloqué tout simplement) et cela pour des maj de 20 mo ou 300 mo, actuellement la meilleure façon de mettre à jour DBD est de désinstaller entièrement le jeu et le réinstaller à chaque mise à jour ce qui deviens rapidement très embêtant étant donné qu'il y a environ une maj tous les 2 à 3 jours. (Je tiens à préciser que ce n'est pas un problème causé par mon pc, DBD est le seul jeu de ma bibliothèque avec ce problème et que d'autres jours ont le même problème sur ce jeu uniquement)

4 сурва, 1 манн, играешь кайфуешь, считай что в прятки играешь, только ты можешь выбрать, прачешься ты, или ищешь, только тут могут выйграть и прячущиеся, так что игра крутая, инногда реально нужно поработать мозгами, советую для покупки

Got 111 hours on PC and 600 on PS4. The game is good but is in a weird state due to balancing issues. Games feel stagnant at higher MMR due to survivor friends only running meta builds. There's so many fun interesting perks in the game but why run them when you can run the game with perks and add ons that completely shut killers out of games if they are not constantly playing sweaty. And when the killer has to play sweaty 99 percent of the time it obviously affects the casual survivors who unfortunately get paired with the sweaty SWF group. BUT. The game still has its gem moments like last night when 4 Mikaela's dressed as witches brought me to Police station met in the front entrance and performed a seance to "summon" me.  Idk man. Then I get the toxic SWF group who have clicker mods installed and tbag and spam loud notifications all game. Or the hackers at high MMR... Overall the game can be fun, the people can be fun, and the game has much more potential growth. BUT they need to make other perks and builds more viable and they need to start taking reporting toxic people and hackers more seriously.

Поберегите лучше свои нервы и сыграйте в майкнрафт!

i really fu*king love the killer aspect of this game, i'll never get tired of  watching survivors cry about their teammates throwing or playing like their setup is in a literal garbage container. 

toxic survivors? no problem, try this salt generating build: " Hex: No Way Out, Hex: No One Escapes Death, Coup De Grâce, Bitter Murmur / Gearhead (depends on what you like more) " and laugh as the survivors call you bad and no skill when in reality they couldn't beat a single combo of 4 perks.

the killer aspect is really fun, and you can play for tens of hours at a time without raging, whilst the survivor aspect is really boring and just tiring. you will meet otzdarva's killer skills, and your teammates will have like 4 hours of skill, and you will smash your camera out of pure hate and anger, and you might even turn a kyber crystal red. if you looking to pick up the game, or are considering to buy it, i would recommend the game, but play the first matches as one of the killers, then after you have played killer for a while you can go on survivor, but try to stay as calm as possible when playing, or you WILL lose.

来自山岡家族的鬼武士，你的心好冷，但是我不认识凛妹是谁。
Кому не нравиться издеваться над людьми, управлять ситуацией, а в этой игре это легче всего, заходишь кайфуешь, лучше многих шутеров.
El juego? una mierda, pero me dio de comer fideos

Ich spiele das spiel seit 2 Wochen wieder aktiv und mir mach es deutlich mehr Spaß als früher.ich finde das Dead by daylight kein spiel ist das man abunzu spielt wenn man einergemaßen gut sein möchte muss man das spiel regelmäßig spielen und nicht mal so zwischen Tür und angel. Dead by Daylight ist meiner Meinung nach ein super Horrorgame und ich verstehe nicht wieso so viele mit Matchmaking Probleme haben, ich finde sofort Lobbys und bin sehr schnell in einer Runde. Aber die Cummutiy des Games ist toxic af und das Balancing zwischen surv und Killer ist sehr Bedauernswerd mich nervt vorallem das manche killer viel stärker sind als andere ich denke mal das dass noch kein Problem in Low ranks ist aber wenn man dann auf high Ranks spiel kriegt man da deutliche Probleme wenn man einen schwächeren Killer spielt und mit dem nicht regelmäßig übt. Meiner meinung brauchen viele killer ein rework und manche survs ein nerf. Troz allem kann ich dead by daylight nur weiter empfehlen.
the game is so great. playing with friends is incredibly fun, it is an overall amazing game
Muy entretenido comunidad algo toxica pero sin duda puedes pasar horas y horas sin problema.

It's pretty fun but right now the skill base match making is killing it. But if they get rid of it then i would reccomend this game.

as it is right now, the game is buggy as hell. instead of bringing in meaningful changes to the game to prevent hacking, to reduce bugs, they seem to be really focused on releasing cosmetics and new killers/survivors. get the spaghetti code fixed from the ground up before you start to branch out into more crap that doesn't matter. also MMR system is something the whole community did not ask for, but it got implemented anyway. 

the game is really the best of its kind even with the bugs and i would love to see some more competition out there just so BHVR would buckle up and fix their buggy-as-hell game.
most of my dbd hours were spent afk or waiting for matches 10/10
got it on sale so def worth when I bought it for $10

I really enjoyed playing this game with friends or alone. Couldn't play for a while then and now as i came back im in the worst killer rank of the game stuck with some of the best surviver ranks. While i curtainly belong there at the moment my oponents do not belong into my matchmaking. Also im frequently having a nurse bug where i can't blink a second time. Please fix especially the matchmaking because you can't play casual anymore or try out a new killer without actually getting one kill. At least it feels like this for me. 
I hope you can get this fixed soon so i can have a gereat enjoyment playing this game alone. After all i really like this game.
:)
